name: The Upton Original Wood Co
tag_list: european-oak-flooring, engineered-oak-flooring, english-oak-flooring, solid-oak-flooring, reclaimed-pine-flooring, reclaimed-flooring, custom-made-flooring, parquet-flooring, oak-parquet-flooring
overview:
The Upton Original Wood Co supplies high quality wooden flooring nationwide.

Founded in 2001, they have over 10 yars of wood flooring manufacturing experience behind them. They now offer a huge renage of flooring incuding European Oak, English Oak, Exotic Hardwoods and Reclaimed flooring. Added to which they offer bespoke colouring service.

Based in Oxfordshire UK, they supply National Retrail chains, Architects, Designers, Developers and private induividuals alike.
